reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 214/00: TRANSITION ASSISTANCE GRANTS, NO. 3

content.content:
1. A board specified in Column 1 of Table 1 shall be paid a grant in the amount specified in Column 2 of Table 1 opposite the board’s name. O. Reg. 214/00, s. 1. TABLE 1  Column 1

Column 2
